title: Puaa Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located near the flea market in Jaffa, this funky cafe offers a menu with vegan and vegetarian items marked. Vegan choices include: shakshuka breakfast, majadera (omit yogurt), mung beans in raw tahini, curried pumpkin dumplings, and several salads. Also several starters are vegan, like mung bean hummus and red tahini.
